purpose: Support HR and leadership in conducting structured annual performance reviews with trackable employee evaluations and follow-up goals.
business_value: Ensures compliance with corporate evaluation processes
Provides leadership with data to support promotions or training plans
Allows HR to document improvement plans and actions

mvp_components.app_details: A model-driven app to manage the performance review process, including forms for self-assessment and manager input.

app_screens.screen_details: Structured form for employees to add self-assessment and for managers to submit performance reviews.
Dashboard to track the status of reviews by employee and department.

mvp_components.flow_details: Multi-step workflow to manage the review process from draft to review to confirmation.

flow_actions.action_details: Initiates the review process allowing for draft submissions.
Notifies managers to review and edit performance reviews.
Allows employees to confirm the review outcome.
Finalizes the review, making the record read-only.

mvp_components.app_details: Power BI dashboard to report on compliance and overdue reviews.

app_screens.screen_details: Visualizes the compliance status and highlights overdue reviews.

post_mvp_modules.details: Allows for the creation and tracking of individual development goals post-review.
post_mvp_modules.recommendation: Extend the ModelDrivenApp to include this feature, as it aligns with the existing performance review process.

post_mvp_modules.details: Integrate with the internal Learning Management System to track and recommend training plans.
post_mvp_modules.recommendation: Assess the LMS's API capabilities and consider a custom integration or Power Automate connectors if available.

post_mvp_modules.details: Add a historical view of manager feedback to employee profiles.
post_mvp_modules.recommendation: Extend the ModelDrivenApp to include historical data views, ensuring it respects the hierarchical access constraints.

permissions: Submit and edit performance reviews for reports

constraints: Access must follow hierarchical reporting structure
Review records must be read-only after final submission
